events.msg: Welcome to Nostalgic Paradise! Nostalgic Paradise is a TheXTech asset pack which is entirely of SMB1 16-bit style theme.
This is ground Piranha Plant, which is stationary and meant to be placed outside pipes.
Each stage includes a secret section, and there's a star at the end. Try to find them!
This is checkpoint. When you die after touched, you will be respawned from the checkpoint. Since TheXTech supports infinite checkpoints, there're checkpoints between the each of substages.
Bone Piranha Plants are immune to fireballs.
Due to feature restriction of the current version of TheXTech, Super Stars are replaced by POW blocks.
Frozen items can be defrosted by fireballs.
Scale Lifts are made by using LunaScript's Autocode and a multiple of layers at the current version of TheXTech.
This is a maze castle. Can you find the correct path?
The green muncher will hurt you when touched, and the black muncher only hurts you when standing on the top.
Green trampolines, which makes player jump very high, are uncarriable due to it's written by LunaScript's Autocode.
When placing the hammer bro on the ground, it's recommended to set "Don't Move" to on.

npc.talk: Peach: Thank you for rescue me! Your first quest is over and the world is now returned to peace. We are working on chapter 2 for your next adventure, depending by the version number of TheXTech and Nostalgic Paradise.
